section.title: Write a Table-Striping Plugin
section.para: Open the file /exercises/index.html in your browser. Use the file /exercises/js/stripe.js. Your task is to write a plugin called "stripe" that you can call on any table element. When the plugin is called on a table element, it should change the color of odd rows in the table body to a user-specified color.
Don't forget to return the table so other methods can be chained after the plugin!
